cards.flavor_text: [i]Circumzenith is an independent team of highly-trained Avians dedicated to fighting evil across the plane.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, target opponent reveals X cards from their hand, where X is the number of Moonstone counters you have, and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.
{2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

{B}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: This creature deals 1 damage to any target and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Pay me what I seek and I shall find you your precious Moonstones...”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{2}{G}: Mill 3 cards. You may return a land card in your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
{1}{R}, Discard a card: This enchantment deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of land cards put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn. Activate only once each turn as a sorcery.

Whenever another creature enters under your control, you gain 1 life.
At the beginning of your end step, if you've gained 3 or more life this turn, draw a card.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2 life. If you do, create a 1/1 black Rat Rogue creature token with menace.
Whenever you attack, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw a card and gain 1 life.

Wisdom 4 [i](As an additional cost to cast this, you may exile 4 cards from your graveyard. If you do, copy it, and you may choose new targets for the copy.)[/i]
Whenever you pay a Wisdom cost, create a 2/2 blue and red Drake Elemental creature token with flying.

When Taza enters, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
Other Rat creatures you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of combat, target nontoken Rat you control gains lifelink until end of turn.

When this creature enters, search your library for a paladin card, reveal it and put it into your hand, then shuffle. [i](Armies, Heroes, Knights, Soldiers and Warriors are paladins.)[/i]
Paladin creatures you control have haste.

When this creature enters, you get a Moonstone counter.
{1}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Activate only once each turn as a sorcery, and only if you have 3 or more Moonstone counters.
Search your library for an equipment card and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Put an indestructible counter on that equipment. You may attach it to a creature you control.

cards.notes: December 17th, 2025: Found a more stylistically-matching artwork that will do for now. Before submission, search again to see if there's a piece that matches AND has action and/or implies more status/power.

cards.rules_text: Surveil 2, then draw a card. [i](To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Plenty of Moonstone fragments were seen falling into the ocean, so it was just as busy with eager fragment hunters.[/i]

This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.

cards.flavor_text: [i]The wild, unascended animals saw the falling Moonstones as either new food or unimportant debris.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace, vigilance, trample
As long as an opponent controls more lands or has more Moonstone counters than you, other creatures you control have menace and get +1/+0. Otherwise, other creatures you control have vigilance and get +0/+1.

Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls deal combat damage to you while you have more Moonstone counters than they do, that opponent gets a Moonstone counter. 
Remove two Moonstone counters from yourself: Scry 2. Activate only once each turn as a sorcery.
Create a token copy of each paladin creature you control. [i](Armies, Heroes, Knights, Soldiers and Warriors are paladins.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We cannot let the Moonstones fall into evil paws!”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Destroy all non-outlaw creatures. [i](Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.)[/i]
